cluster_information.name: Energy Preference
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides an interface to specify preferences for how devices should consume energy.

derived_datatypes.name: EnergyPriorityEnum
derived_datatypes.description: This data type is derived from enum8.

enum_values.name: Comfort
enum_values.description: This value SHALL emphasize user comfort; e.g. local temperature for a thermostat.

enum_values.name: Speed
enum_values.description: This value SHALL emphasize how quickly a device accomplishes its targeted use; e.g. how quickly a robot vacuum completes a cleaning cycle.

enum_values.name: Efficiency
enum_values.description: This value SHALL emphasize how much energy a device uses; e.g. electricity usage for a Pump.

enum_values.name: WaterConsumption
enum_values.description: This value SHALL emphasize how much water is consumed during device use; e.g. how much water a dishwasher uses during a cleaning cycle.

derived_datatypes.name: BalanceStruct
derived_datatypes.description: This represents a step along a scale of preferences.

fields.name: Step
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate the relative value of this step.

fields.name: Label
fields.description: This field SHALL indicate an optional string explaining which actions a device might take at the given step value.

attributes.name: EnergyBalances
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a list of BalanceStructs, each representing a step along a linear scale of relative priorities.

attributes.name: CurrentEnergyBalance
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the current preference of the user for balancing different priorities during device use.

attributes.name: EnergyPriorities
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate two extremes for interpreting the values in the EnergyBalances attribute.

attributes.name: LowPowerModeSensitivities
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate a list of BalanceStructs, each representing a condition or set of conditions for the device to enter a low power mode.

attributes.name: CurrentLowPowerModeSensitivity
attributes.description: This attribute SHALL indicate the current preference of the user for determining when the device should enter a low power mode.

features.name: EnergyBalance
features.description: Device can balance energy consumption vs. another priority

features.name: LowPowerModeSensitivity
features.description: Device can adjust the conditions for entering a low power mode
